metadata.name: {FilesName}
metadata.description: Building the best file manager for Windows.

community.title: Zaprojektowany i opracowany przez Ciebie.
community.description: {FilesName} is free and open source software, maintained and designed by a collective of hundreds of contributors.
community.contributions: {amount, plural, =0 {Brak udziałów} one {# udział} few {# udziałów} many {# udziałów} other {# udział}}

design.title: Power meets beauty.
design.description: Explore a beautiful Windows-first design. Manage all your files with increased productivity. Work across multiple folders with tabs. And so much more.

features.title: It already does that.
features.description: Cloud files integration? Tabs and multiple layouts? Rich file previews? {FilesName} has it covered with robust features you expect from a modern file manager.

cloud.title: Seamless cloud integration
cloud.description: Built-in support for cloud drives such as OneDrive, Google Drive, and iCloud.

preview.title: Preview pane
preview.description: Preview photos, videos, and documents without opening them. Please note that some file formats are not currently supported.

tags.title: Tag files and folders
tags.description: Organize and sort your files and folders with colored tags.

tabs.title: Multitask with tabs
tabs.description: Avoid multiple windows and keep your desktop clutter-free with tabs.

columns.title: Widok kolumn
columns.description: Quickly navigate through different levels of the file system using the column layout.

archives.title: Wyświetlaj i edytuj archiwa
archives.description: Create and extract archives including zip, WinRar, and 7zip.

git.title: Git integration
git.description: Easily manage your Git projects. Create new branches, switch between them, and sync your changes - all without leaving Files.

dual-pane.title: Dual pane
dual-pane.description: View and manage two folders side by side with the Dual Pane feature.

hashes.title: Hashes
hashes.description: View and compare file hashes from the properties window.

themes.title: Distinctly personal.
themes.description: Have it your way. {FilesName} features a fully customizable user interface, right down to the colors and materials. Try custom themes that are built into {FilesName} or dive right into the docs and create your own.

download.title: Pobierz {FilesName}
download.donation_description: {FilesName} is a community-driven project that depends on your support to grow and improve. Please consider purchasing {FilesName} through the Microsoft Store or supporting us on GitHub if you use the classic installer.

microsoft_store.title: Download Files
microsoft_store.description: Purchasing {FilesName} through the Microsoft Store helps support the developers and allows us to continue updating the app with new features and improvements.

preview.title: Insider Preview
preview.description: The preview version can be installed alongside the stable release and provides early access to new features and improvements.

self_signed.description: Nie masz dostępu do Microsoft Store? Wypróbuj naszą
